DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Suchan, Tomasz
Alvarez, Nadir
DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Seed mass and germination in the four Trollius europaeus populations
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Mass measured on 25 seeds per fruit (column mass; in mg). Germination is measured as the number of germinating seeds form 25 initial ones, after two weeks (column germination). Seeds used for germination tests were the same as for weight measurement. For details on the germination trial please refer to the publication.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: pollination
brood-site pollination
mutualism
pollinator loss
reproductive ecology
seed germination
